Statute.Title: Eldorado Nuclear Limited Reorganization and Divestiture Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Réorganisation et aliénation de Eldorado Nucléaire Limitée, Loi sur la)

General.Text: Consequential amendments, ss. 12 to 14 (see R.S., c. 33 (4th Supp.), ss. 1 to 3)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1988, c. 41 in force on assent 28.07.88 except s. 4(4) in force 30.09.88 see SI/88‑191, s. 5(6) and (7) in force 26.09.88 see SI/88‑180, par. 5(1)(d) in force 31.10.88 see SI/88‑224; s. 15 repealed before coming into force 31.12.2011 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3
CIF, 2001, c. 18, s. 1 in force on assent 14.06.2001
